title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 701.19 - Discharge restriction categories
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 701.19 - Discharge restriction categories

State Regulations

Discharge restriction categories may be assigned to
surface waters or groundwaters by the department. When used, the discharge
restriction category will be applied to such classified waters along with the
applicable best usage and other existing standards. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
701.19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
